pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Linear Mixed-Effects Models // Maximum a posteriori estimation for linear and generalized linear mixed-effects models in a Bayesian setting, implementing the methods of Chung, et al. (2013) doi:10.1007/s11336-013-9328-2. Extends package 'lme4' (Bates, Maechler, Bolker, and Walker (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v067.i01).
